comment: по клику на собираемый хаос энджин

languages.text: Запчасти, которым было предначертано стать священным орудием кары Империума, сложены в устрашающую и богомерзкую конструкцию.
Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
languages.original_text: Запчасти, которым было предначертано стать священным орудием кары Империума, сложены в устрашающую и богомерзкую конструкцию.

traits.locale_text: The parts that were destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning were instead assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
The parts that were destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning were instead assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
The parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning were instead assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
The parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning were instead assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

languages.text: 这些零件本该安装在帝国的神圣武器上，但最终却被组装成了可怕的亵渎造物。
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

traits.locale_text: 这些零件本该安装在帝国的神圣武器上，但最终却被组装成了可怕的亵渎造物。

languages.text: Au lieu de former une arme sacrée du jugement de l'Imperium, ces pièces ont servi à assembler une abominable structure sacrilège.
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

traits.locale_text: Au lieu de former une arme sacrée du jugement de l'Imperium, ces pièces ont servi à assembler une abominable structure sacrilège.

languages.text: 帝国の聖なる兵器になるはずだった部品は、恐ろしい冒涜的な構造物の一部となってしまった。
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

traits.locale_text: 帝国の聖なる兵器になるはずだった部品は、恐ろしい冒涜的な構造物の一部となってしまった。

languages.text: Las piezas destinadas a convertirse en un instrumento sagrado del juicio del Imperium ahora forman parte de una creación terrible y sacrílega.
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

traits.locale_text: Las piezas destinadas a convertirse en un instrumento sagrado del juicio del Imperium ahora forman parte de una creación terrible y sacrílega.

languages.text: Die Teile, die dazu bestimmte waren, eine heilige Waffe des Imperiums zu werden, wurden stattdessen zu einem furchterregenden und blasphemischen Konstrukt zusammengebaut.
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.

traits.locale_text: Die Teile, die dazu bestimmte waren, eine heilige Waffe des Imperiums zu werden, wurden stattdessen zu einem furchterregenden und blasphemischen Konstrukt zusammengebaut.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'un hesaplaşmasının kutsal bir silahı olmaya mukadder parçalar, dehşet saçan hürmetsiz bir yapıya dönüşmüş.
languages.original_text: Parts destined to become a holy weapon of the Imperium's reckoning have instead been assembled into a frightening and sacrilegious construct.
